column2: "No, no, I wasn't hintin' that you should go! I'd be totally cool with it if you did, though."
"But this time, it's crazy dangerous 'cause they're fast AND powerful. I bet even you'd have a rough time."
"...Well, lately I've come to understand that no matter what I say, you're gonna make it happen."
"All I can really do is cheer ya on from here, so go give 'em hell. I can't wait to hear your report!"
